trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit custom properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control.
trans-unit.target: 提供編輯器控制項，可讓終端使用者編輯相關聯之自訂屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The PropertyGridEditorPart provides a generic user interface (UI) that enables users to edit custom properties on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and server controls placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: PropertyGridEditorPart 提供一般的使用者介面 (UI)，可讓使用者在編輯自訂內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>伺服器控制項放在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> controls, edit only existing, UI-oriented properties from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>控制項，只有現有的、 編輯 UI 導向屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls, and each of these must reside in a corresponding type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: 就像 Web 組件控制項集合中有工具導向的區域 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>類別概觀) 有工具導向組件的控制項，其中每一項都必須位於工具區域的對應型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: These kind of controls in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize the controls that form the primary UI of a page in a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: 這些類型的 Web 組件控制項集合中的控制項有兩個特殊的特性:-是讓終端使用者個人化 Web 組件的應用程式中形成主頁面的 UI 控制項的協助程式控制項。

trans-unit.source: - They are visible only in certain page display modes.
trans-unit.target: -才看得見只在特定的頁面顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The PropertyGridEditorPart control is a special control, and it becomes visible only when a Web page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control has been selected by a user for editing.
trans-unit.target: PropertyGridEditorPart 控制項是特殊的控制項，並只有在網頁上處於編輯模式，且時特定變成可見<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或編輯伺服器控制項選取的使用者。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The PropertyGridEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, must reside in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone on the page.
trans-unit.target: PropertyGridEditorPart 控制項，如同所有其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項都必須位於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>頁面上的區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>只能包含區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項不能放在任何其他類型的區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The PropertyGridEditorPart control provides an editing UI for properties that are marked in the source code with the `WebBrowsable` attribute (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebBrowsableAttribute> class).
trans-unit.target: PropertyGridEditorPart 控制項提供屬性與原始程式碼中標示為編輯的 UI`WebBrowsable`屬性 (從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebBrowsableAttribute>類別)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebBrowsableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: When a property is marked with this attribute, a PropertyGridEditorPart control creates the editing UI based on the type of the property, and uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> object if needed to convert the value in each editing control to the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: PropertyGridEditorPart 控制項時屬性標示了這個屬性時，建立根據屬性的類型的編輯 UI，並使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>物件，如果需要將每個編輯控制項中的值轉換成屬性的型別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: You can also add other attributes that help the PropertyGridEditorPart control to display the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以加入其他屬性，以協助 PropertyGridEditorPart 控制来顯示的編輯 UI。

trans-unit.source: The `WebDisplayName` attribute (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDisplayNameAttribute> class) allows you to specify the text for the label that appears with each control in the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: `WebDisplayName`屬性 (從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDisplayNameAttribute>類別) 可讓您指定的文字出現的標籤與每個控制項中的編輯 UI。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDisplayNameAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The `WebDescription` attribute (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute> class) allows you to specify a string that appears as a ToolTip for each control in the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: `WebDescription`屬性 (從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute>類別) 可讓您指定為編輯的 UI 中的每個控制項的工具提示顯示的字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The controls created to edit properties of various types are listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中所編輯的各種類型的屬性建立的控制項。

trans-unit.source: |Property type|Control created to edit the property| |-------------------|------------------------------------------| |String|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>| |Int, Float, Unit|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>| |Boolean|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>| |<xref:System.Enum>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> (contains the list of enumerated values)| |<xref:System.DateTime>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>| The PropertyGridEditorPart class has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A> property, which is used to get or set the visible title text for the control.
trans-unit.target: |屬性類型 |若要編輯的屬性建立控制項 | |-------------------|------------------------------------------| |字串 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>| |Int、 Float、 單位 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>| |布林 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>| |<xref:System.Enum>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>（包含列舉值的清單） | |<xref:System.DateTime>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>| PropertyGridEditorPart 類別具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A>屬性，用來取得或設定控制項的可見的標題文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Enum> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: There is also a protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Display%2A> property, which determines whether the control is displayed when the page enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 沒有也受保護<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Display%2A>屬性，決定頁面進入編輯模式時，是否顯示控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.Display%2A>

trans-unit.source: The PropertyGridEditorPart class also has two important methods, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: PropertyGridEditorPart 類別也有兩個重要的方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>，它繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>類別並覆寫。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited.
trans-unit.target: 方法非常重要，因為它們可讓取得和設定的編輯器控制項的欄位值和屬性之間的屬性值上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制所編輯。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Because the PropertyGridEditorPart control allows you to edit only custom properties, you will need the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in the Web Parts control set to edit the appearance, layout, and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 由於 PropertyGridEditorPart 控制項可讓您編輯自訂的屬性，您將需要其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>中若要編輯的外觀、 配置和行為設定的 Web 組件控制項的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The other controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>、 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but if necessary, you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 這些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制項應該提供編輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，但如果有必要，您也可以建立繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>的自訂編輯器控制項</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>所需的最編輯功能</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>類別概觀主題。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the PropertyGridEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 來改善存取範圍，PropertyGridEditorPart 要呈現控制項內`<fieldset>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the PropertyGridEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: `<fieldset>`項目群組是用來在 PropertyGridEditorPart 控制項中，編輯控制項的相關的組和它能在這些控制項間索引標籤式瀏覽視覺化使用者代理程式 （例如一般的網頁瀏覽器） 和語音導向使用者代理程式 （例如螢幕助讀軟體）。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針可能不符合網頁可及性呈現，根據預設，此控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 建立類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The PropertyGridEditorPart constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: PropertyGridEditorPart 建構函式是預設值。沒有建構函式宣告中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>類別，因此沒有特殊的工作會執行建立類別的新執行個體時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 將儲存的值從<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref>中相關聯的對應屬性的控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: ApplyChanges 方法是關鍵的方法上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method saves the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 方法會將儲存的使用者已設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>中相關聯的對應屬性的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在參考相關聯的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項的繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > You cannot override the ApplyChanges method because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> type is sealed to prevent inheriting from it.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為無法覆寫 ApplyChanges 方法的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>型別密封格式，以防止繼承自它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control provides, you can create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control and provide your own implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您需要編輯不同的程序需以程式設計方式控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制屬性比<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>提供控制項，您可以建立自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制，並提供這個方法的實作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set the values on public custom properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, provided that those properties each have a `[WebBrowsable(true)]` attribute.
trans-unit.target: ApplyChanges 方法會嘗試在公用中相關聯的自訂屬性上設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，前提是這些屬性每個都有`[WebBrowsable(true)]`屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: ApplyChanges 方法稱為當使用者按一下按鈕，表示確定或編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 中套用動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also call it directly from your own code if there is a need to save the edited values apart from user actions.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以呼叫它直接從您自己的程式碼是否需要儲存的編輯的值除了使用者動作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果儲存的動作值從<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref>至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>成功，否則 （如果發生錯誤）， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定屬性的值相關聯時，發生錯誤<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫繼承自的基底屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref>以隱藏的屬性，從設計工具，並避免其受到佈景主題的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: 雖然是公用的這個屬性用於此控制項的預設呈現，並不是從開發人員程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that receives the default focus in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，其中包含識別碼<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>預設焦點在控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否應為時顯示其相關聯<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The Display property returns `false` if the value on the base property is also `false`.
trans-unit.target: 顯示屬性會傳回`false`如果基底屬性的值也是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the control to be edited is not `null`, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果要編輯的控制項不是`null`，然後在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>顯示控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The Display property applies only when a page is in edit mode, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: 只有當頁面處於編輯模式，將顯示屬性適用於和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>已選取要編輯的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, and updates the corresponding controls used to edit those property values within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的值從<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項，然後更新用來編輯這些屬性的值中的對應控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: SyncChanges 方法是關鍵的方法上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: 它會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>基底類別的方法會擷取目前的值從相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，然後更新中的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>具有這些值，讓使用者編輯控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: SyncChanges 方法稱為每當中相關聯的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項可能已變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>包含控制項的區域呼叫 SyncChanges 方法後立即呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法，使中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項一律中相關聯的值與同步<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 稱為 SyncChanges 方法的另一個案例是當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項進入編輯模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定編輯器控制項的標題。

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Title 屬性值會顯示在標題列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制控制項時顯示在編輯模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 控制項在頁面中宣告時，您可以設定的值`Title`屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未提供標題的值，提供特定文化特性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The Title property overrides the base property so that, if no title value is supplied, a default title appropriate to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control can be supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Title 屬性覆寫基底屬性，因此，如果沒有提供任何標題值，預設值標題適合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>控制項可以提供的 Web 組件控制項集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，做為控制項的標題。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是由 Web 組件控制項集合提供計算的控制項名稱。
